summary:
Undramatic ENB is not dramatic ENB preset.
This provides no impressive visual, but improves the expression of Vanilla (or lighting/weather mods).
descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#A0C0E0][size=+4][b]Undramatic ENB[/b][/size][/color][/center]
[center]This is NOT dramatic ENBSeries preset.
This provides no impressive visual, but improves the expression of Vanilla (or lighting/weather mods).
[/center]


[heading][color=#A0C0E0][size=+2]Requirements[/size][/color][/heading][list]
[*]The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
[*][url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]ENBSeries[/url]
[*][url=http://dev-c.com/skyrim/enbhelper/]Skyrim ENBHelper[/url]
[/list]
Note that [url=http://www.guru3d.com/files_details/sweetfx_shader_suite_download.html]SweetFX[/url] is NOT required for this preset.


[heading][color=#A0C0E0][size=+2]Installation[/size][/color][/heading]
[b][size=+1]1. Install [url=http://enbdev.com/download_mod_tesskyrim.htm]ENBSeries[/url][/size][/b]

Download the latest version of ENBSeries.
The Files listed below are only required from contents downloaded.
(Choose one from "Wrapper Version" and "Injector Version" - for details, read ENBSeries readme)

[u][b]Wrapper Version[/b][/u]
[list][*][code][color=#AADDEE]d3d9.dll[/color][/code]
[*][code][color=#AADDEE]enbhost.exe[/color][/code]
[/list]
[u][b]Injector Version[/b][/u]
[list][*][code][color=#AADDEE]enbseries.dll[/color][/code]
[*][code][color=#AADDEE]ENBInjector.exe[/color][/code]
[*][code][color=#AADDEE]enbhost.exe[/color][/code]
[/list]
Copy or cut these files and paste to the Skyrim folder that "TESV.exe" is located.
(e.g. [code][color=#AADDEE]C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim[/color][/code])



[b][size=+1]2. Install this ENBSeries preset[/size][/b]

Download this preset (Undramatic ENB).

[color=#AADDEE][b]From version 0.254.0.0[/b][/color], the 2 edition is available.
Their difference is whether or not some effect causing performance hit are enabled.
[list]
[*]Undramatic ENB
[*]Undramatic ENB Lite (DoF and SSAO Disabled)
[/list]
Choose one of them you like.

The Files and folders listed below are required from contents downloaded.

[list][*][code][color=#AADDEE]enbseries[/color][/code]
[*][code][color=#AADDEE]enbseries.ini[/color][/code]
[*][code][color=#AADDEE]enblocal.ini[/color][/code]
[/list]
Copy or cut these files and paste in the same folder that you installed ENBSeries.
(e.g. [code][color=#AADDEE]C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim[/color][/code])



[b][size=+1]3. Install [url=http://dev-c.com/skyrim/enbhelper/]Skyrim ENBHelper[/url][/size][/b]

Download the latest version of Skyrim ENBHelper.
Copy or cut [code][color=#AADDEE]enbhelper.dll[/color][/code] and paste in the [code][color=#AADDEE]enbseries[/color][/code] folder in Skyrim folder.
(e.g. [code][color=#AADDEE]C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/steamapps/common/skyrim/enbseries[/color][/code])

Skyrim ENBHelper is needed to use "multiple weathers" function of ENBSeries.



[b][size=+1]4. Edit [code][color=#AADDEE]SkyrimPref.ini[/color][/code][/size][/b]

Open [code][color=#AADDEE]SkyrimPref.ini[/color][/code] with a text editor.
Edit values of the settings listed below (if settings don't exist, add them).

----------------
[code][color=#AADDEE]bFloatPointRenderTarget=[b]1[/b][/color][/code]
[code][color=#AADDEE]bTreesReceiveShadows=[b]1[/b][/color][/code]
[code][color=#AADDEE]bDrawLandShadows=[b]1[/b][/color][/code]
[code][color=#AADDEE]bShadowsOnGrass=[b]1[/b][/color][/code]
----------------


[heading][color=#A0C0E0][size=+2]Uninstallation[/size][/color][/heading]
Just delete all files you installed.


[heading][color=#A0C0E0][size=+2]Recommanded Mods[/size][/color][/heading][list]
[*][url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=1499]Skyrim particle patch for ENB[/url]
[/list]

[heading][color=#A0C0E0][size=+2]Compatibility[/size][/color][/heading]
"Compatibility" means that you gain non-odd visual on using this preset with weather or lighting mods.
The Mods listed below are found no problem so far as I checked.
[list]
[*]No weather or lighting mods
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17609]Religting Skyrim[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/17802]Climates Of Tamriel[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043]Enhanced Lights and FX[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30450]Realistic Lighting Overhaul[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/39799]Climates Of Tamriel - Weather Patch[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50065]Natural Lighting and Atmospherics for ENB[/url] (only use esp files)
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50855]Shadows[/url]
[*][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/52423]Pure Weather[/url]
[*][url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=1930]Enhanced Lighting for ENB[/url]
[/list]
[color=#AADDEE][b]From version 0.254.2.0[/b][/color], There are patches for weather mods at Optional Files.
These patches adjust this ENB setting a little to be suited to weather mods.
If you use weather mods with this ENB setting, download patches and overwrite Main File.
Without patching (using only Main File), this ENB setting is suited to Vanilla (no weather mod).

[color=#AADDEE][b]From version 0.254.1.0[/b][/color], if you use [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50855]Shadows[/url] with this preset, you may think of that some places are too dark.
To brighten these places, I recommend you to use "Interior Lighting" modules of [url=http://enbseries.enbdev.com/forum/viewtopic.php?f=6&t=1930]Enhanced Lighting for ENB[/url] together.
Load order of Shadows and Enhanced Lighting for ENB is listed below.
[list]
[*]Shadows - Skyrim.esp
[*]ELE-Interior Lighting.esp
[*]Shadows - Dawnguard.esp
[*]ELE DG-Interior Lighting.esp
[*]ELE HF-Interior Lighting.esp
[*]ELE DB-Interior Lighting.esp
[/list]
If you use these mods, please read the description of them.
In some cases, other processes are required for using both ENB and mods.

Other weather or lighting mods may cause strange visual, but I'm not sure.


[heading][color=#A0C0E0][size=+2]Credit[/size][/color][/heading][list]
[*][b]ENBSeries[/b] by Boris Vorontsov ([url=http://enbdev.com/]ENBSeries Web Site[/url])
[*][b]effect.txt[/b] by Andrej Dudenhefner, Christian Jensen, ZeroKing ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/50638/]Post-Process Effects Addon for ENB[/url])
[*][b]enbeffect.fx[/b] by JawZ, HeliosDoubleSix, MTichenor ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36720/]ENB resources for Skyrim[/url])
[*][b]enbbloom.fx[/b] by IndigoNeko ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/23765/]SkyRealism - ENB Evolved[/url])
[*][b]enbeffectprepass.fx[/b] by gp65cj04 ([url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24024/]Bokeh DoF and Tilt Shift for ENBSeries[/url])
[/list]

[line]

Have a enjoy.
author: scripthoge

files.name: Undramatic ENB 0_252_0_2
files.changelogHtml:
[Fixed]
- Fire intensity was decreased to fix that some effects (e.g. giant smash, steams and so on) are too bright.
(Intensity settings of [FIRE] section affect some effects that are not the kind of fire)

[Tweaked]
- Cloud intensity and curve in the daytime was decreased a little.

files.name: Undramatic ENB 0_252_0_3
files.changelogHtml:
[Tweaked]
- Point lighting intensity of interior was decreased a little.
(To make more compabilitible with lighitng mods)
- The weather setting of Blackreach removed.

files.name: Undramatic ENB 0_252_1_0 - Normal Edition
files.changelogHtml:
[Added]
- "CoT Edition" Added.

[Tweaked]
- particle intensities of sunrise/day/sunset were increased.

[Miscellaneous changes]
- Edition for no weather mod was named "Normal Edition."

files.name: Undramatic ENB 0_252_1_0 - CoT Edition
files.changelogHtml:
[Added]
- "CoT Edition" Added.

[Tweaked]
- particle intensities of sunrise/day/sunset were increased.

[Miscellaneous changes]
- Edition for no weather mod was named "Normal Edition."

files.name: Undramatic ENB 0_252_2_0
files.changelogHtml:
[Added]
- "Optional Sky Lighting" Added.

[Merged]
- "Normal Edition" and "CoT Edition" is merged to the 1 edition.

[Tweaked]
- Sun brightness (glow intensity) adjusted.
- Constrast decreased.
- Brightness increased.
- Visual of characters (actors) in shade is improved.

files.name: Optional Sky Lighting 0_252_2_0
files.changelogHtml:
[Added]
- "Optional Sky Lighting" Added.

[Merged]
- "Normal Edition" and "CoT Edition" is merged to the 1 edition.

[Tweaked]
- Sun brightness (glow intensity) adjusted.
- Constrast decreased.
- Brightness increased.
- Visual of characters (actors) in shade is improved.

files.name: Undramatic ENB 0_254_0_0
files.changelogHtml:
[Added]
- "Lite Edition" Added.

[Tweaked]
- SpecularAmountMultiplier (Sunrise/Day/Sunset/Night/InteriorDay/InteriorNight) of [ENVIRONMENT] decreaced.
- AmbientLightingIntensity (Night) of [ENVIRONMENT] increased. Night was brightened a little.
- PointLightingIntensity (InteriorDay/InteriorNight) of [ENVIRONMENT] decreased a little.
- FogColorCurve (Day) of [ENVIRONMENT] increased.
- [SKYLIGHTING] effect was enabled by default.
- [SUBSURFACESCATTERING] effect was weakened.
- Intensity (Day) of [PARTICLE] is decreased a little.

files.name: Undramatic ENB 0_254_1_0
files.changelogHtml:
[Tweaked]
- AmbientLightingCurve (Sunrise/Day/Sunset/Night/InteriorDay/InteriorNight) increased. Cloudy, Rainy and snowy day looks more natural (suppressing brightness).
- Interior brightness were decreased to near vanilla.
- Many parameters changed to keep and improve graphic provided by this ENB preset.

files.name: Undramatic ENB 0_254_1_1
files.changelogHtml:
[Tweaked]
- [SUBSURFACESCATTERING] parameters restored from version 0.252.2.0
- SpecularAmountMultiplier of [ENVIRONMENT] restored from version 0.252.2.0
- interior brightness adjusted (AmbientLightingIntensity and AmbientLightingCurve increased).

files.name: Undramatic ENB 0_254_1_3
files.changelogHtml:
[Added]
- "Alternative DOF Effect" Added.

[Fixed]
- Weather setting for caves in Forgotten Vale added to fix over-brightened fogs.

[Tweaked]
- DirectLightingIntensity (Sunrise/Day/Sunset) of [ENVIRONMENT] increased except CoT weathers.

files.name: Alternative DOF Effect 0_254_1_3
files.changelogHtml:
[Added]
- "Alternative DOF Effect" Added.

[Fixed]
- Weather setting for caves in Forgotten Vale added to fix over-brightened fogs.

[Tweaked]
- DirectLightingIntensity (Sunrise/Day/Sunset) of [ENVIRONMENT] increased except CoT weathers.

files.name: Undramatic ENB 0_254_1_4
files.changelogHtml:
[Tweaked]
- Brightness of Sunrise/Sunset Sky weakened a little.
- Sun color (SunColorFilter) of Sunrise/Sunset turned orange.
- Intensity of Sunrise/Sunset Sun Rays strengthened a little.
- Dispersion, Parallax, Displacement, Silhouette, Blurring and Reflection of [UNDERWATER] disabled.

files.name: Undramatic ENB
files.changelogHtml:
[Added]
- Patches for weather mods added.

[Tweaked]
- This ENB setting was Overhauled to improve however, kept something "undramatic"
- Bokeh of far objects by DOF Effect weakened.

files.name: Patch for Climates Of Tamriel
files.changelogHtml:
[Added]
- Patches for weather mods added.

[Tweaked]
- This ENB setting was Overhauled to improve however, kept something "undramatic"
- Bokeh of far objects by DOF Effect weakened.
